author: SHarms
text: Enough! Stop with the fighting on line! Love each other, respect each other. You don't know when your voice won't matter...use it for love, Respect and understanding!! THAT IS WHAT MATTERS💖

author: SHarms
text: Know this.. we just lost a loved family member, my BFF just lost her sister, out of the blue, we just lost a good friend, my heart is broken!

author: SHarms
text:
Waiting for Mercury in Retrograde to end. 😅
Needing a peaceful easy feeling to show up.....Eagles music is helping 🎵🎶🎼

author: SHarms
text: I see it, I hear it....more than I want to. If you can't communicate something without saying it straight, simple and hold yourself accountable for it....keep your mouth shut 😏

author: SHarms
text:
Please explain why questions that require ONLY a Yes or No answer are so difficult for some!
Stop making things so F!!king complicated!

author: SHarms
text: Twitter needs a Thumbs down response Icon or something equivalent. Sad there's so much hate on here. 😔

author: SHarms
text:
The level of hate on this media is astounding! It's all about arguing as apposed to discussing. 
The difference? 
Arguments are about who is right.
Discussions are about what is right.
I prefer discussions.

author: SHarms
text:
The difference between an Argument and a Discussion. 
Look it up.

author: SHarms
text: Elizabeths facial expressions are her tell. She's wanting 15 more minutes of fame and No accountability for her poor work ethic, still looking for a husband.#BelowDeck

author: SHarms
text: Jenna is not holding her self responsible for the issue. Its called accountability and no one is immune. Lead by example and put your job first! #belowdecksailing
